TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TickBar extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement
.class public auto ansi TickBar extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件为 控件绘制一组刻度线。

span.span: Represents a control that draws a set of tick marks for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件绘制宽度为1个像素的刻度线。The control draws tick marks that have a width of one pixel. 您可以通过指定重复间隔或一系列显式点来定义刻度线的位置。You can define the location of the tick marks by specifying a repeating interval or a series of explicit points. 控件专门用于处理 控件。The control is specifically designed to work with a control. 显示刻度线。A displays tick marks. 下图显示了一个具有 的 。The following illustration shows a that has a . **带有 TickBar 的滑块****Slider with a TickBar** ![滑块插图](~/add/media/genericslider.png "滑块图")![Slider illustration](~/add/media/genericslider.png "Slider illustration") 控件通常在 的 中定义。 controls are typically defined in the of a . 有关 中包含的 的示例，请参阅[滑块样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates)。For an example of a that is included in a , see [Slider Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates). 和 控件都包含执行相同功能的属性。The and controls both contain properties that perform the same function. 下表显示 属性以及这些属性所绑定到的相应 属性。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they are bound. 如果同时指定了 和相关 属性，则 属性将优先。The properties take precedence when and properties that are related are both specified. **相关的 TickBar 和滑块属性****Related TickBar and Slider Properties** | 属性 property| 属性 property| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| |||

value.span: 如果显示选择范围，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a selection range is displayed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks "" 和 "" 属性定义选择范围。The and properties define a selection range. 当 设置为 `true`时，必须设置这些属性以显示选择范围。These properties must be set for the selection range to appear when is set to `true`. 下图显示了一个 控件，该控件包含已定义选择范围的 。The following illustration shows a control that contains a that has a selection range defined. ![滑块选择范围](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "滑块选择范围")![Slider selection range](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "Slider selection range") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 获取或设置刻度线最大的可能值。

The largest possible value for a tick mark.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示 和 值的主刻度，并显示其他值的辅助刻度。Primary ticks are displayed for the and values, and secondary ticks are displayed for other values. 对于水平 ，主刻度的高度等于 的 。For a horizontal , the height of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 对于垂直 ，主刻度的宽度等于 的 。For a vertical , the width of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 辅助刻度的大小为主刻度大小的75%。The size of the secondary ticks is 75 percent of the size of the primary ticks. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

span.span: The that is used to draw the ticks.

summary.span: 绘制 控件的刻度线。

span.span: Draws the tick marks for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和 属性的值确定在 绘制刻度线的位置。The values of the property and the property determine where tick marks are drawn in a . 显示 和 值的主刻度，并显示其他值的辅助刻度。Primary ticks are displayed for the and values, and secondary ticks are displayed for other values. 对于水平 ，主刻度的高度等于 的 。For a horizontal , the height of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 对于垂直 ，主刻度的宽度等于 的 。For a vertical , the width of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 辅助刻度的大小为主刻度大小的75%。The size of the secondary ticks is 75 percent of the size of the primary ticks. 如果 `true` 属性并且 和 属性有效，则此方法还会在选择范围的开始和结束位置绘制刻度。This method also draws ticks at the beginning and the end of a selection range if the property is `true` and if the and properties are valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值用于确保正确显示 中的可见部分，如选择范围的终结点指示符。The value is used to make sure that the visible parts of the , such as the end point indicators of a selection range, are displayed correctly. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 获取或设置包含为 指定的刻度线的区域的空间缓冲区。

span.span: Gets or sets a space buffer for the area that contains the tick marks that are specified for a .

value.span: 表示刻度线的行或列的任意一侧的总缓冲区的一个值。

span.span: A value that represents the total buffer area on either side of the row or column of tick marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 属性定义的空间缓冲区旨在确定 控件在 任意一端时所用的空间。The space buffer that is defined by the property is designed to account for the space that the control uses when it is at either end of the . 属性的值分为半部分。The value of the property is divided in half. 空间的一半用作刻度线集合一侧的一个缓冲区，而另一半空间用作该集合的另一端上的一个缓冲区。One half of the space is used as a buffer on one side of the tick mark collection, and the other half of the space is used as a buffer on the other side of the collection. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 获取或设置刻度线之间的间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval between tick marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为一个不 `null`的值，则不使用 属性。If the property is set to a value that is not `null`, the property is not used. 刻度线按照 属性指定的间隔绘制，从 属性的值开始，直到达到 属性的值。Tick marks are drawn at the interval that is specified by the property, starting at the value of the property and continuing until the value of the property is reached. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的刻度线超出 和 属性值定义的范围内，则不会显示。Tick marks that are defined by the property and that are outside the range that is defined by the and property values do not appear. 如果设置了 属性，则不使用 属性。When the property is set, the property is not used. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
